projects.title: CoffeeQueue Pro
projects.summary: In busy café environments, long physical queues frustrate customers and reduce operational efficiency. CoffeeQueue Pro solves this by offering a virtual queue system where customers can join the queue online, see their real-time position, and receive updates without waiting in line — freeing them to relax, browse the café menu, or explore nearby areas while they wait..

projects.title: AI Recipe Creator
projects.summary: AI Recipe Creator uses natural language prompts to generate complete recipes tailored to available ingredients, dietary restrictions, serving size, and cuisine style. It produces ingredient lists, step-by-step instructions, and optional shopping or nutrition info to make cooking faster and easier.

projects.title: Communication App
projects.summary: Built a responsive real-time communication platform using React.js and modern frontend practices. The app allows users to send and receive messages in a chat interface, view active conversations, manage contacts, and features an intuitive UI with smooth, user-friendly interaction flows. Backend functionality is simulated using local state and storage to prototype real-world UX.
